doc.title: Gay Getaways: Las Vegas
doc.plot: Saddle up partner as we join our host Greg Osborne as he tours and explores "sin city," the famed Las Vegas, Nevada! Our tour begins with Greg checking into the exclusive and palatial Blue Moon Resort, just off the famed Las Vegas Strip. For two full days we follow Greg as he digs into the best restaurants, nightclubs, book stores, and pizzeria's, and more for the discriminating gay traveler. Day three Greg is joined by "Babs," as we scope out the fascinating Lake Mead Recreational areas, and the famed Hoover Dam. Don't miss this one-of-a-kind opportunity to see the "real" gay side of one of the most famous and fabulous resort locations in the entire world!
